summary: Completed comprehensive testing of new RentMaestro features: Dark mode toggle, Excel export functionality, and Gmail SMTP email reminders system. All backend APIs achieved 100% success rate (25/25 tests passed). Frontend testing confirmed all new UI features are working correctly with proper integration.
passed_tests: Dark Mode Toggle - Persists in localStorage and applies theme correctly
SMTP Configuration - Email and password fields with test connection functionality
Email Reminders Settings - Frequency selector and proper validation
Export Excel Button - Downloads payments with year filter
Reminders Button - Opens pending payments dialog correctly
Export Year Selector - Filters data by selected year
Settings Save Functionality - Displays success messages
Navigation Between Pages - All page transitions working
Data Persistence - Settings saved and retrieved correctly
Error Handling - Proper validation and error messages
